result.execSummary:
The defendant Timothy S. BURKE was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Retail Theft. This is not a criminal offense and results only in a money penalty for this offense.

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Timothy S. BURKE

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
The State moves to amend count 1 to county ordinance retail theft, contrary to Manitowoc County Ordinance 6.14.  Motion granted.
NO CONTEST plea entered to the amended charge.  Convicted.
The State moves to dismiss and read in count 2.  Motion granted.
The Court imposes a $50.00 forfeiture plus costs, total of $267.50, to be paid by 08-22-15 or 5 days county jail for failure to pay.
Reminder notice mailed to defendant.

Settlement Conference Summary.
Settlement conference with District Attorney is reset to 05-07-15 at 11:30 a.m.

Not guilty pleas.  Jury Calendar.  Settlement conference with District Attorney set for 03-31-15 at 2:30 p.m.  Plea date is set for 07-02-15 at 9:00 a.m.   Bail is set at $250.00 recognizance bond with the condition that defendant is to have no contact with Fleet Farm.  Bail furnished.
Minutes.

RE:  Fleet Farm, on 01-25-15.
Initial appearance is et for 03-23-15 at 1:30 p.m.
